title: The Underground
description: In a mysterious Ground Zero Green Zone Trancegirl discovers there are more people going in The Underground than coming out, and has to wear a short skirt just to get someone to listen. Dancegirl is paid to dance, when all she wants to do is get into grad school. When you're young, a lot of things don't make sense, like getting on a subway and ending up in the Underground. If you surface, you might end up in Piccadilly Circus in London, listening to stories about Frankenstein and King Arthur.
author: John Blandly
